评论概述: The Perfect Versatile Shirt with Fun Flair
评论详情: I recently purchased a shirt that has quickly become one of my favorites, and I just had to share my thoughts on it. This shirt features fun sleeves that add the perfect amount of flair without overwhelming the overall look. They strike an excellent balance between stylish and practical, making it a standout piece in my wardrobe.  One of the first things I noticed about this shirt is its lightweight fabric. While it’s thin, it doesn't feel flimsy or poorly made. In fact, it has a nice quality to it that suggests it will hold up well over time, even with regular wear. The fit is fantastic; it hugs my body in all the right places while still allowing enough room for comfort. Whether I’m dressing it down for a casual outing or dressing it up for a night out, it adapts beautifully to whatever style I’m going for.  What I love most about this shirt is its versatility. On a casual day, I can pair it with jeans and sneakers for a laid-back look, and it feels effortlessly chic. On the flip side, when I want to elevate my outfit for a more dressy occasion, I can easily tuck it into a skirt or dress pants, and it instantly transforms into a polished ensemble. This adaptability makes it a staple in my wardrobe, and I can already see it becoming my go-to top for various occasions.  In conclusion, this shirt is a delightful blend of style, quality, and versatility. With its fun sleeves, comfortable fit, and lightweight feel, it’s perfect for anyone looking to add a little flair to their outfits. Whether you’re aiming for casual or dressy, this shirt delivers on all fronts. Highly recommended!

When I pulled this shirt out of the package I was annoyed seeing it was made in China since their sizes are known to run too small. I was pleasantly surprised. It is a t shirt material, fits true to size and lace on arms is soft not itchy. Love it! The green is pretty for a change. I would definitely order another one, different color. Well made, not cheap.

This shirt is beautiful, especially in the dark green color! Love the lace sleeves. At 5’8”, it is a good length right about hip level. The sleeves are a little short for my preference but not too short. Not super form fitting but also fits in a flattering way. It is lightweight and very comfortable. I was wearing this shirt out for a few hours, went to the bathroom and noticed a hole on the side seam! I usually inspect a shirt before I wear it but failed to do so with this one. Super disappointed because I know I did not cause this hole. I love the shirt so much that I wanted a replacement, so I was sent one. I inspected it and it seems to be flaw/hole free, so we shall see how it holds up! I got it on sale for 12 bucks so you may get what you pay for! I will update if shirt fails me again.

This shirt is a beautiful, deep purple. It is a real, cotton t-shirt material, not that weird polyester stuff. The sleeves are fairly delicate and not stiff feeling at all. The sides have a feminine cut but is not fitted too tight. I’m super impressed and plan on buying a couple more in different colors. I actually got a small instead of my recommended size of medium and it fit perfectly.
Fits well. Comfortable. Color deep and remains so after washing. Does not cling, is not see through. Decent quality. Not particularly warm, but is not advertised as such.

Bought it one day on a lightning sale and loved it so much I bought another one at full price then I even ordered my mother one. It’s comfortable but dressy enough that you could wear it to work or church yet relaxed enough to wear over to a friend‘s house. It fits flattering, not too baggy, but also not too tight to cling. The rigging on the chest is a really flattering feature. (Sorry for the bad picture quality).
Gorgeous shirt, fits true to size and easy to care for. I received a lot of complements when I wear it. Very comfortable and can be dressed up or just casual - it would work both ways.

I like the color of the shirt. I also like the fit. The only reason it doesn't get five stars from me, is because the sleeves are a little short and I'm probably going to have to push them up and make them 3/4 length. I haven't washed it yet, so I'm not sure what it's washability is, but straight out of the package when I tried it on it felt nice. It's a little on the thin side, which I like being that I have hot flashes a lot. I also like the airflow I get from the sleeves. For reference, I am about 5'9" and about 155 lbs. I purchased the medium, and it fits very nicely. It might be a little baggier than I expected, but I think it looks nice on me. Depending on how it washes, I might purchase another one in a different color.

评论概述: Husband quote: "Makes boobs look bigger because of the lines."
评论详情: I've only tried it on  because I just got it today. No idea if I will get compliments on it; I will let you know :). It's not my all-time favorite blouse, but it's nice, especially for the price. I just washed it in a linen bag and hung it up wet; there were a few wrinkles but not many. I ordered a size small and it's a bit big; I am not sure if other reviewers have mentioned that.BTW,  I don't have large breasts, so you can decide if my husband's comment is a plus or minus for you.

I loved the style of this and really wanted to love it once it got here. Although the details are super cute and the lace is a nice touch (and not itchy!!) the sizing is really big, and the length is long (think tunic length in like 2008?) and for the particular detailing on the shirt, it should be more fitted. It's SO CLOSE to being awesome and I'm so disappointed.

I am loving all the blouses I’ve purchased from AUTOMET. I’ve purchased a few styles, but this one is the most flattering for my 5’3” 170 lb. weight.  Sleeves and front patterns give it a dressier look, so using it for dress and casual wear. Material is very soft and stretchy and drapes really well.  Didn’t wrinkle when I wore it.  That’s a big plus for me.  I don’t care for ironing much.

评论概述: This is not as fitted as it appears in pictures
评论详情: This shirt has a rather oversized fit to it. I expected it to be a little more form fitting but it just isn’t. It basically hangs off of me. I normally wear an XL so that’s what I bought and it’s honestly too big for me. It’s very lightweight but is very nice looking if you dress it up. I just don’t feel the all around cut and fit of the shirt is great. I feel it runs large. It does wash fairly well with no washer wear if you wash it on the gentle cycle.

This shirt was perfect to wear to my work holiday party. It was comfortable but still looked professional. One of my favorite features of this top are the sleeves. They're lightweight and covered my arms but weren't warm at all. I was concerned that long sleeves would make me too warm inside of a busy restaurant, but this top completely prevented that! You could easily dress this up or down and I look forward to wearing it on more occasions.

This shirt exactly matches the sale photo on Amazon. I'm sure it would be as lovely in the other colors available. This shirt will be worn for church when the weather warms. The lace sleeves are too pretty to cover with a jacket or coat. I think you will really enjoy this shirt.

I love this versatile, comfortable shirt. The middle part is stretchy and the fabric feels like T-shirt material. The fabric for the arms isn’t quite a stretchy, but the lace design is interesting and it keeps you warm without being too warm. I have paired it with slacks for work and also with jeans to wear outside of work and it looks great either way.
This is a nice fit and lace sleeves are thicker which is nice. Color wasn’t exactly as pictured but close.
Wish 3/4 length sleeves were available
I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this shirt. It’s definitely a goodbye. You won’t be disappointed. It goes great with jeans and dress clothes.
This shirt is a soft material, fits perfect (true to size) and is so cute! I bought the black one and it looks fantastic with my black slacks. I highly recommend!

When I got the shirt, I tried it on and the first thing I noticed was how cool the sleeves were. And I mean temperature wise as they are made of a beautiful lace. The only reason I’m returning is because there were a lot of pull threads in the top of the lace.  The shirt is very stretchy and lightweight.  I would’ve liked for it to be a little bigger so it wouldn’t have shown me looking like a busted can of biscuits. 😝 No fault of the shirt, It’s just my body type.  If you’re going through menopause, I suggest this shirt
The overall product was better than expected.  Material is soft on skin and the sleeves are beautiful.  True to size great fit.  Iam going to order more colors.

Love these, got basically every color (red is my favorite), I use them for work (I work in an administrative setting).  The arm designs are fetching but you’ll need a coat to go over them in cold weather.  Adios
I've enjoyed this top.  I bought it in green for Christmas.  I got a lot of compliments.  Washes nicely.  This top can be dressy or casual.

The color is fabulous 👌 It was for Christmas dinner and was perfect.  It is not too anything and it's very flattering.  The lace on the sleeves makes it dressy but not too much. And the fabric is soft and comfortable 😌.
I love the color and fit of this blouse. The quality of the fabric is great. I have gotten so many compliments on it. It isn’t flimsy at all. I would highly recommend this shirt.
Mom liked
I wore this for Christmas.  The sleeves are absolutely adorable. The ribs on the front give it a classy look too. It is thin and was perfect so I wasn't overheated while cooking.

评论概述: Beautiful blouse, but the lace sleeves are super fragile.
评论详情: The first day I wore it, I loved the way it fit and looked on me. I even got several compliments on it. However, inside of one hour my bracelet got caught in the lace on the sleeve and began to snag. I was clipping pieces of thread way more than I wanted to. I must say though, even though the snags were annoying, I still, low-key, love it and I’ll probably buy again in another color. 🤷🏽‍♀️

Perfect color, fit, and length. I have the short sleeve version of this and loved it so much (and got complimented so much) that I needed a long sleeve, as well. I'm going to have to buy more colors, it's just a great, comfortable, and cute shirt to have on hand, and very versatile!

评论概述: Comfortable but more like a tshirt
评论详情: This shirt is very comfortable but draped more like a tshirt on me. I give it a high rating because it is something I would have worn if that’s what I was looking for. However I needed more of a blouse with stiffer fabric, so I returned it.. Highly recommend if you are looking for a daily shirt that is comfortable but still elegant looking.

This blouse isn't red as described. It's a wine burgandy color as you can see in the photo. It's a nice dressy blouse for cocktail parties. Cotton blouse with lace sleeves; true to size and somewhat stretchy.

评论概述: Great staple to add to your wardrobe.
评论详情: This top is very cute and well made. Pairs well with jeans or a pair of leggings. I bought it in 2 different colors. It is very comfortable and can easily be dressed up with a skirt and pair of boots. Great value for the money.

Overall its a cute blouse. I did find that for my body, the sleeves hit slightly above the wrist. I also found the lace sleeves to be a bit itchy, but it could be the sensitive nature of my skin. It is a looser fit around the middle that can help to hide the tummy. Easy to dress up.
I bought this shirt around the holidays as a gift to myself. No regrets! I felt gorgeous and happy in my new shirt. The sleeves give it a nice dimension and flare.
Love the soft, comfortable feel of the fabric. The fabric is just thick enough for winter so feminine because of the lacy sleeves. Wear day into nighttime fun!

I know they "adjust" clothing on models, but from this photo I thought the shape of the garment was NOT boxy. It shows a figure on the woman. However, the actual item is a complete box. Not terribly flattering without some judicious tailoring to make it better.  On the other hand, I love the lacy sleeves. They are NOT scratchy. The rest of the top is soft and wonderful, too. I will be wearing it after I "fix" it.

I purchased this top in purple and was extremely pleased with the color and quality. You can wear it with jeans or dress up with nice slacks. The details in the sleeve and upper front were well made. And this washed very well. For good measure I added a color catcher in case of bleed through. I recommend this product and will buy more from this seller.
Love the shirt and can wear in hot weather because of the sleeves! Fits bigger and am glad I got a size smaller than I normally wear! Love the color!
I really like the looks of this shirt. The sleeves are pretty but delicate.  Snag very easily.
Right size I ordered this in black and white love them
Fits perfect got lots of compliments ☺️ fabric is good quality and it's wrinkle resistant.
Wish the sleeves were a little longer but other than that it is a very cute shirt
I love this top. Decent quality and good fit. The eyelet sleeves are flattering and it’s very comfy. Happy with my purchase.
It is so comfortable. I’ve worn it a few time and it washes up nicely no fading of the color and no shrinkage! It is one of my favorites in my closet .
Very elegant design. Love it!! Bought it for Christmas but I’ll wear it for work too. I got lots of compliments!!

This blouse is light weight and soft. I got a medium and it fits well. It’s loose fitting. Packed it for travel and it never wrinkled. I love the see through Lacey sleeves. I bought black and thinking about getting it on white.
This shirt is very nice looking. I received so many compliments wearing this. The sleeves are slightly breezy, but I like it. I've worn it with dress pants and with jeans. Very pleased.
It was a good fit and comfortable

评论概述: Way softer than I thought it would be!
评论详情: I thought this was so cute! I ordered it but was nervous as I can not handle scratchy fabric. As neurodivergent with sensory issues my clothes have to be comfortable! This was very comfortable, modest, and the fabric is soft. I was able to wear it all day at our Thanksgiving gathering. Menopausal I get hot, but the lacy sleeves kept me cool while still looking put together, instead of my usual tank top.

I love this blouse. It is very flattering and the lace sleeves are a beautiful touch. The material is soft and gives more of a flowy look, but you could tuck in the front and wear a belt. It’s such a cute look. Material is soft and comfortable. Didn’t shrink on the wash. I bought more colors after my first purchase!
La talla es un poquitin mas chica pero esta bien
Really like the style an material but it is really small for a medium.
I like the lightness of this top. Not sure how well it will hold up after multiple washes, thus 4 stars. It is very comfortable and fits well.

Beautiful coral color, material unexpectedly soft with a light fleecy interior feeling, lacey sleeves attractive. Good for tucking into jeans and also long enough to wear as a tunic length over a skirt and cinched with a belt. Recommend for price, comfort, style & versatility.
Really pretty. Looks nice. Buy the same size as you usually wear it’ll fit
Bought this shirt for a casual concert outfit. I wanted something still concert black but slightly different. I like the sleeve detail and that the shirt hides a soft stomach.
Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She is 5’4” and 110 and a small fit her just fine. The sleeves are beautiful and the shirt is well made
I wore this for 2 concerts & it looked great & was not too hot as the sleeves were lace. I had a few compliments on it as well.
This is a cute top but you may need to size up.  I had to return for a larger size.
Love the shirt, but know if you want to wear it to work your bra straps will show through the lace.

This top is beautiful, but runs big. I wear a small but needed an extra small.
Exactly as shown in picture. Great fit washes nice.
Just like pictured, super cute for a night out, it’s long, I recommend tucking it in, soft material

Great shirt and very comfortable. Does run big. Would size down.
Very nice top for under $15. It runs large. I'll return and reorder if still the same price. Thanks
This is a cute shirt. Appears to run true to size. Love the color and the cut out sleeves.

Comfy, cute, easy to wash and wear, releases stains--even chocolate! This I know from experience.  There is no unusual smell to it, it's terrific quality, and I would suggest that, because of the shape, it will fit women of all different sizes.  It has a tee-shirt material body that seems to be a cotton/polyester blend

This is such a nice top, whether you wear it with jeans, or a nicer pair of pants.  I could wear this to church, or anywhere else I might be in the course of a day.  The fit is very gracious to the female form; it gently skims your curves, without clinging to every little bump/bulge.  The stitching across the top of the bodice is very attractive, and definitely takes the style up a notch or two.  The lacy sleeves are a really nice touch, and as a person who is usually warmer than everyone else in the room, they help me stay comfortable when the heat is blasting during the winter months.  I should add here that I have this top in the short-sleeved summer version, and have it in 4 or 5 colors.  I liked this long-sleeved version  well enough to buy it in 3 more colors.  No regrets!
Great shirt. It fit in all the right places. Material is light and feels comfortable. The sleeves flow nicely and have a lovely pattern. True to size.
Very good quality I have washed it couple times already and it is holding pretty well.
I get so hot wearing holiday sweaters or anything wool.  This is so nice that it is festive yet cool!!!!  Also purchased the dark sage green and I just love them!  The price makes it even better!!
I like this shirt a lot. The black makes any pair of jeans look fancy and the top also goes well with dress pants. Large fit me well - I am 5'7" and 165lb
Muy bonito con detalles muy finos

The sleeves are made of a nice lace but the main section is medium thickness material and wasn’t see through at all. I washed it on gentle cycle and hung dried it and turned out nicely. I got mine in black and the color was solid and didn’t leak.
Item as described. Would recommend & purchase again. I choose to wash & hang to dry.
Love the material and the shirt.
It is comfortable and the size fit great.
Accurate for size. Super cute

I was apprehensive about a few things when I purchased this cute top. 1. Itchy/scratchy sleeves? The lacy fabric is soft. No irritation at all. The lace does continue to the neck, so a bra with nude straps is recommended. 2. High neckline feeling constrictive? Not at all. The neckline (like the rest of the shirt) is extremely soft. The neckline did not feel restrictive at all. Top is very comfortable and flattering. Living in Houston, TX, there are seasons & occasions that call for a long sleeve, but temperatures are still too warm for for long sleeves. Enter this top with lacy sleeves. I was not disappointed. I wasn’t cool by any means in late October, but I believe this top was more comfortable for 90-95 degree temps than a regular 3/4 or long sleeve option. It runs pretty true to size, but if you like a loose fit, size up. I like the detail stitching from the neck; I think it makes a flattering visual line. I’ve already bought two more in different colors, because autumn temps will still not arrive for at least a couple of months.
Beautiful color, true to size, and very comfortable!! Super cute too!!
The design, the fabric and color. Love it
Nothing to dislike about, I would buy all colors. I bought 2x, and it fit perfectly.

评论详情: Like the color and material. Size is true to fit
I purchase this for my daughter for her birthday.  She loved it.

I am 5’4 130ish pounds. (Can vary month to month). But this top is wonderful I get a lot of compliments wearing it. It is a lighter material which is perfect for the up coming fall. It doesn’t seem to wrinkle easily which is perfect for packing. I ordered a small and it is still somewhat baggy on me which I do like my shirts fitting a little loosely.
Color is true. Pretty top!
I really like the blouse.  So glad I ordered a size larger than I normally wear. I usually order Med but decided  to order a large; I'm glad I did; it fits fine.  Happy with it so far.
I really like this shirt! Unfortunately, if you don’t wear a skin tone bra you will see the straps in the back because of how the sleeves are cut. That’s my only complaint! Love the look.

I really like this top! I'm always a bit nervous when it comes to the sizing, but I ordered a large and it fit perfect. It is flattering and I like that the sleeves give it a little something extra. I have washed it and it washed up well with no issues; I did put it in the dryer on low for about 15 minutes to get out the wrinkles and then hung to dry.
